launch_weeks.evidence: 2020-09-28 (Epic React) shows massive spikes across all support categories
launch_weeks.recommendation: Pre-launch FAQ preparation, increased support capacity

black_friday_cyber_monday.recommendation: Pre-sale FAQ on invoices, refund policy clarity, login alternatives

year_end_invoices.pattern: Invoice requests spike in late November through January
year_end_invoices.evidence: Recurring December spikes in 'invoice or receipt'
year_end_invoices.recommendation: Proactive invoice/receipt FAQ, self-service invoice generation

growth_trends.note: Magic link issues largely resolved since 2023
PPP issues resolved - no recent tickets
Bug reports much lower than 2020-2022, occasional spikes

insights.launch_pattern: Product launches (Epic React Sep 2020) cause 10-20x spike in ALL support categories simultaneously. Need launch-specific FAQ bundles.
insights.holiday_pattern: Black Friday/Cyber Monday consistently drives invoice requests and post-purchase refunds. Proactive FAQ can reduce load.
insights.resolution_success: Magic link and PPP issues that plagued 2020-2022 are now largely resolved - evidence of successful FAQ/UX improvements.
insights.new_products: AD and Quick question feedback are emerging tags - monitor for new FAQ needs.
insights.bug_volatility: Bug reports are spiky rather than steady - suggests incident-driven rather than chronic issues.

proactive_faq_calendar.action: Prepare launch-specific FAQ covering: purchase/payment issues, access setup, magic links, refund policy
Refresh invoice/receipt FAQ, ensure self-service invoice generation is documented
Prominently feature refund policy FAQ, payment troubleshooting, login alternatives
Year-end tax documentation FAQ for enterprise customers
